text: Need Hayden Bell for Priceline campaign. Budget around $6,645, looking for 2 x 30-second Instagram reel, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x Pinterest pin, 2 x Instagram story. 2 week exclusivity from other similar brands. Campaign runs November 2025. Usage rights for 6 months. Engagement period: 3 months. Additional notes: TBC on exact dates, around $6,645 budget
